SEARCH
Package Server.Controller

Interface RMIGatewayInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIGateway
public interface RMIGatewayInterface extends Remote
The RMIGatewayInterface interface defines the methods that can be invoked remotely by clients. It extends the Remote interface, which is the marker interface for remote objects.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    barrelsStatus()
    Retrieves the status of the barrels.

  • Method Details

    • searchQuery

      List<String> searchQuery(String query, int pageNumber) throws RemoteException, MalformedURLException
      Searches for a query and returns a list of search results.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query
      pageNumber - the page number of the search results
      Returns:
      a list of search results
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      MalformedURLException - if the URL is malformed

    • getWebsitesLinkingTo

      List<String> getWebsitesLinkingTo(String targetUrl, int pageNumber) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves a list of websites that are linking to the target URL.
      Parameters:
      targetUrl - the target URL
      pageNumber - the page number of the search results
      Returns:
      a list of websites linking to the target URL
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • receivePing

      void receivePing(int barrelID, String barrelIP) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException, MalformedURLException
      Receives a ping from a barrel with the specified ID and IP address.
      Parameters:
      barrelID - the ID of the barrel
      barrelIP - the IP address of the barrel
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
      NotBoundException - if the barrel is not bound
      MalformedURLException - if the URL is malformed

    • removeBarrel

      void removeBarrel(int barrelID) throws RemoteException
      Removes a barrel with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      barrelID - the ID of the barrel to be removed
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • mostSearched

      List<String> mostSearched() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves a list of the most searched queries.
      Returns:
      a list of the most searched queries
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
